naslov: Samostojeća Kuća s 3 apartmana (300m od mora), Povljana (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se odlična samostojeća kuća na otoku Pagu, u mjestu Povljana, samo 300m od mora, s okućnicom od 350m2. Kuća je u izvrsnom stanju, s potpuno novom termo fasadom i PVC stolarijom. Sastoji se od 3 odvojene stambene jedinice, 2 od po 95m2 i  1 od 70m2. Stanovi se sastoje od dvije spavaće sobe, dnevnog boravka s blagovaonicom i kuhinjom, kupaonice s WC-om te terase/balkona. Puni su svjetla i imaju zaseban ulaz. Pomoćni objekt ima stambenu jedinicu koja se sastoji od dnevnog boravka s blagovaonicom i kuhinjom, odvojene sobe te kupaonice s WC-om. Okućnica nudi potencijal za izgradnju bazena, a parkirnih mjesta ima za tri ili više automobila. Ovo je izvrsna prilika za turističku nekretninu ili za život. Kuća posjeduje svu potrebnu dokumentaciju te je moguća kupnja putem kredita. Za više informacija slobodno nazovite +385 95 855 8408. ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ ENG: An excellent detached house for sale on the island of Pag, in the town of Povljana, just 300m from the sea, with a plot of 350m2. The house is in excellent condition, with a brand new thermal facade and PVC joinery. It consists of two separate residential units of 95m2 each and an auxiliary building of 70m2. The apartments consist of two bedrooms, a living room with a dining area and kitchen, a bathroom with a toilet, and a terrace/balcony. They are full of light and have separate entrances. The auxiliary building includes a residential unit that consists of a living room with a dining area and kitchen, a separate bedroom, and a bathroom with a toilet. The yard offers potential for a swimming pool, and there is parking for three or more cars. This is an excellent opportunity for a tourist property or for living. The house has all the necessary documentation and can be purchased with a loan.
